notes.note:
I am a web designer/developer based in Santa Barbara, California. The content herein could be described as a gathering of my various design and development efforts, rendered in the stream-of-consciousness spirit of a tumblelog. Maybe we call it a tumblefolio?
The design and navigational format of this site were inspired by a quote from Antoine de Saint Exupéry, "La perfection est atteinte non quand il ne reste rien à ajouter, mais quand il ne reste rien à enlever." or, "A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away."

You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to allow the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
